entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
